E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Kenny Lofton
Dear Sir,
Kenny Lofton is hitting the ball well at A Modesto A's!
He has an AVG of .313, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Scott Brosius
Dear Sir,
Scott Brosius has nothing more to prove at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an AVG of .297 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
